description: A wrapper/bundling format designed to contain a collection of files that in aggregate represent a single logical document in the OpenDocument Format (ODF) family.  Based on the ZIP format and incorporating an XML-based manifest file to list component files.
name: ODF 1.1 Package.  OASIS name: Open Document Format for Office Applications (OpenDocument) v1.1. ISO name: ISO/IEC 26300:2006, Information technology -- Open Document Format for Office Applications (OpenDocument) v1.0

relations.title: Sustainability of Digital Formats: Planning for Library of Congress Collections
